Content: Local Problem Solving (Environment, Welfare, Urban Issues)
AI System-Based Problem-Solving Service for Paju Smart City Welfare and Environment Management
Occurrence of citizen-perceived urban problems such as environmental pollution, urban imbalance, and welfare blind spots
Early detection and response to environmental/welfare problems through AI sensor and video-based real-time monitoring
Object Detection, Predictive Modeling, GIS Visualization, IoT Integration, Dashboard-Based Analysis
Improvement of citizens' quality of life, environmental improvement, enhancement of urban management efficiency, and smart city diffusion
